data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/oydsEHmBeqZnXv8v2Aw34rs699I.jpg","id":306,"title":"Beverly Hills Cop III","original_title":"Beverly Hills Cop III","overview":"When his boss is killed, Detroit cop Axel Foley finds evidence that the murderer had ties to a California amusement park called Wonder World. When she meets his estranged younger brother Ronny, an emotional and passionate man, she finds herself drawn to him. She tries to resist, but Ronny, who blames his brother for the loss of his hand, has no scruples about aggressively pursuing her while Johnny is out of the country. As Loretta falls for Ronny, she learns that she's not the only one in her family with a secret romance.","poster_path":"/2mnVWpvsHEHHnfvLn1NXYVvBGl5.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18,10749],"popularity":29.075,"release_date":"1987-12-16","video":false,"vote_average":6.846,"vote_count":900},{"backdrop_path":"/cCvp5Sni75agCtyJkNOMapORUQV.jpg","id":111,"title":"Scarface","original_title":"Scarface","overview":"After getting a green card in exchange for assassinating a Cuban government official, Tony Montana stakes a claim on the drug trade in Miami.
